channel.title: Antoine Flandroit on Antoine Flandroit
channel.description: Recent content in Antoine Flandroit on Antoine Flandroit

item.title: Planning an Erasmus
item.description: The first thing to do is to choose the place where I want to do my course. Since I am a biology student, the best is to go to a natural place. The most naturel places in Japan are the nothern districts so I am still hesitating between going to Hokkaido or Tohoku.

item.title: Example Talk
item.description: Embed your slides or video here using shortcodes. Further details can easily be added using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: Creating this website
item.description: It was pretty difficult at the beginning because my knowledge in R Studio was nothing more than zero, but now that I'm getting used to it, I feel like I can do whatever I want.
